rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Add sign language on to the national schools curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599565

Provide funding for BSL classes for all school and college students and staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602411
